These flats are strategically positioned to benefit from natural light and ventilation, enhancing the overall living experience.

Our featured listings emphasize quality construction materials, modern fittings, and energy-efficient designs. Review these key features that define the best residential options available today.

features.title: Optimized Layouts and Space Efficiency
features.description: The modern 2BHK flat in Sector 104 is meticulously designed to maximize usable area, avoiding wasted space often seen in older constructions. These efficient layouts feature open-plan living and dining areas, large windows, and smart storage solutions. You will find that these apartments feel significantly larger than their measured size, offering a highly practical living environment for a young family or professional couple seeking a comfortable dwelling in a premium location.

features.description: Sector 104 sits at a strategic nexus point, providing easy access to both the Delhi-Noida Direct DND Flyway and the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway. This prime geographical positioning ensures seamless connectivity to key business districts, educational institutions, and world-class healthcare facilities. features.description: The local infrastructure surrounding Sector 104 Noida is robust and continuously improving. whyChoose.title: Why Sector 104 is the Smartest Choice for Buying a 2BHK Flat in Noida
description: Sector 104 has quickly emerged as one of Noida's most desirable residential locations, appealing strongly to those seeking modern living without the overcrowding of older sectors. The availability of high-quality 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 104 is matched by the area's excellent planning and future-ready infrastructure.
Choosing this location means prioritizing convenience, security, and long-term financial growth. Here are eight compelling reasons why purchasing your next home here is an unparalleled decision.

This reduces daily travel time significantly, allowing residents to maintain a better work-life balance. Investing here positions you close to major employment centres, ensuring high demand for rentals and boosting property valuation over time.

Improved public transportation access will dramatically increase property values and make commuting even easier for those working across the NCR region. faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a 2BHK Flat in Sector 104 Noida
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to the most common queries regarding property purchasing, investment potential, and legalities concerning apartments in Sector 104.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 104 Noida
faqs.answer: The price of a 2BHK flat in Sector 104 can vary significantly based on the specific project, the builder’s reputation, the exact size in square feet, and the level of amenities offered. Generally, you can expect prices to range from approximately INR 55 Lakhs to INR 85 Lakhs, though premium or larger configurations might exceed this range. It is crucial to check the carpet area versus the super built-up area and factor in additional costs like registration fees, stamp duty, and maintenance charges when budgeting for your purchase.

faqs.question: Is Sector 104 Noida a good location for investment purposes specifically
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 104 is considered an excellent location for real estate investment. Its strategic position near the Noida Expressway, proximity to established employment hubs like Sector 132 and 135, and improving social infrastructure ensure steady demand, both from homebuyers and tenants. Experts predict strong capital appreciation over the next five years due to ongoing development and proposed infrastructure upgrades, including connectivity enhancements, making a 2BHK flat here a financially sound decision.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect in a modern 2BHK community here
faqs.answer: Modern residential communities offering a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 104 typically provide a comprehensive list of amenities. These often include clubhouses, dedicated indoor and outdoor sports facilities such as badminton courts and swimming pools, jogging tracks, and 100 percent power backup for essential services. Security is high priority, featuring CCTV surveillance, intercom facilities, and gated access control, ensuring a comfortable and secure living environment for all residents.

faqs.question: Are the properties in Sector 104 RERA compliant and legally clear
faqs.answer: The vast majority of newly constructed and reputable projects offering a 2BHK flat in Sector 104 Noida are RERA registered. We strongly recommend only pursuing RERA compliant properties to ensure transparency, timely delivery, and legal clarity regarding the title and approvals. Our platform only lists properties that meet all regulatory requirements, and our legal team can assist in verifying documentation before you finalize your purchase agreement.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of Sector 104 to Central Delhi and Greater Noida
faqs.answer: Sector 104 boasts excellent regional connectivity. It offers quick access to the Noida Expressway, which connects directly to Greater Noida and facilitates smooth travel towards Agra and other cities. For travel to Central Delhi and South Delhi, the DND Flyway is easily accessible, making the commute surprisingly efficient. While a dedicated metro station is often awaited, current connectivity via road networks and public transport is highly robust and satisfactory.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes for a 2BHK Flat For Sale in this sector
faqs.answer: The typical sizes for a 2BHK flat in Sector 104 Noida usually range from approximately 950 square feet to 1250 square feet of super built-up area, depending on the builder and the layout design. When viewing listings, always inquire about the carpet area which represents the actual usable space within the walls. Larger flats often include features like a utility balcony or extra storage space.

faqs.question: Can NRIs buy property in Sector 104 Noida and what is the process
faqs.answer: Yes, Non-Resident Indians NRIs are legally permitted to purchase residential property, including a 2BHK flat, in Sector 104 Noida. The process is similar to that for resident Indians, but specific documentation like NRE/NRO bank accounts are required for transactions. We specialize in assisting NRIs with property identification, legal verification, and securing necessary clearances to ensure a hassle-free and compliant purchase experience.

faqs.question: What are the hidden or additional costs associated with buying a 2BHK flat
faqs.answer: Beyond the basic property price, buyers must account for several additional costs. These typically include stamp duty and registration charges which are levied by the government and usually amount to 5 to 7 percent of the property value. Furthermore, costs like GST on under-construction properties, maintenance security deposits, electricity and water connection charges, and club membership fees should be factored into your total budget calculation.

faqs.question: How is the social infrastructure like schools and hospitals near Sector 104
faqs.answer: Sector 104 is well-served by quality social infrastructure. Leading educational institutions such as Amity International School, The Shriram Millennium School, and Shiv Nadar School are located nearby. Reputable hospitals and healthcare centres, including Felix Hospital and Jaypee Hospital, are easily accessible, providing residents with comprehensive medical support and educational excellence right within the vicinity of their new 2BHK flat.

faqs.question: What are the current trends regarding appreciation rates in Sector 104 Noida
faqs.answer: Current real estate trends indicate positive appreciation rates in Sector 104, generally outperforming older, saturated markets in Noida. The primary drivers are the launch of several high-end projects, the development of connecting infrastructure, and the influx of new businesses along the expressway. We observe steady year-on-year growth, making the purchase of a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 104 a compelling choice for long-term capital gain investors.
